metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3834 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflows in the BnHDCP::onTransact function in media/libmedia/IHDCP.cpp in libstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted application that uses HDCP encryption, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, aka internal bug 20222489.

notes.Note: jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
